pageContext.analysis: Trump had this comment over an article about one of his favorite false claims about the election -- that 50,000 ballots were found in Ohio. But that's not correct. The Franklin County Board of Elections said in an Oct. 9 {news release} that “49,669 voters received an inaccurate ballot,” promising to have correct ballots mailed out in 72 hours. “We want to make it clear that every voter who received an inaccurate ballot will receive a corrected ballot,” the board said. “Stringent tracking measures are in place to guarantee that a voter can only cast one vote.”
